nodes.title: 💡是什么宠物？（英文，若开启SAM分割必填）
是什么品种？（可选，英文，反推提示词用)

宠物类别务必填写 >>👉
其余可以默认

💡免费版 bizy SAM 分割不支持超过1536图像的输入
为了性能考虑，放到本地执行

由于bizyair 免费版限制，暂无 IC 拼接，会导致参考一致性略下降
Fill+Redux 无IC 简易重绘，这种情况下提示词很重要
👉一定要使用提示词辅助引导，否则会差的很远

widgets_values: A cute, light beige French Bulldog puppy curled up in a plush, light gray, rectangular dog bed. The puppy has a short, smooth coat and is sleeping peacefully. The dog bed is placed on a wooden floor with a light brown finish. In the background, there is a woven basket with green plants, and a white cabinet is partially visible on the right side. The lighting is soft and natural, creating a cozy atmosphere. The image is a high-quality photograph.
If there is any pet in the image, such as a cat or dog, you must use the English name of the user-specified animal category: {name}.

You are a prompt assistant, and the user is an enthusiast of generating realistic photo-level images using ComfyUI. Your task is to create suitable English prompts for generating images based on the user's needs, written in natural language format, without including negative prompts.

General prompt template:
Example Prompt: A hyperrealistic portrait of a weathered sailor in his 60s, with deep-set blue eyes, a salt-and-pepper beard, and sun-weathered skin. He’s wearing a faded blue captain’s hat and a thick wool sweater. The background shows a misty harbor at dawn, with fishing boats barely visible in the distance.

A photorealistic Golden Retriever lying comfortably on a quilted gray blanket in a bright, modern bedroom. The dog has a luxurious cream-colored coat, friendly expression, and a gently wagging tail. Natural light streams in through a large window, creating a warm, cozy atmosphere. The room features minimalist decor with a white nightstand adorned with a yellow table lamp, small vase with greenery, and a teacup. Cream-colored curtains and white bedding complete the serene, Scandinavian-inspired interior design. 8k resolution, professional photography, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field.

nodes.title: 💡 是否启用自动裁切的方式（可选）

⬇️免费bizyair joycaption2 不支持长边大于1536长度的图像
因此需要检测并处理此类情况，限制最大长边像素
if else 节点支持惰性求值（部分节点不支持这个功能）
所以当输入图不超过1536时，不满足的路径不会被执行

方形裁切需要有足够的像素
否则只会限制到边界

widgets_values:
flux 对不同品种的宠物效果有好有坏，有的品种的狗可能需要 magnific 来刷

姿势和构图也会对生成有较大的影响


待优化的：
方形裁OK
强制方形裁切（扩图补偿）？

完全的bizyari化？（非强需求）


封装需要考虑的问题：
1、算力
* 目前是bizyair + 少量本地算力
如果全 bizyair ，本地硬件要求会比较低，只要能搭建comfy 就可以运行
需要单独的IP 实例和 硅基的 API key(当前硅基免费，但不能并发，每日1000次请求）

* GPU算力
需要GPU算力

封装需要的技术：
comfyui 作为本地后端
当然需要安装 python pytorch 那一大套基本后端组件

前端只是做一个界面调用工作流（类似 krita 或者 ps 的桥接插件）
或者使用 comfyui 的api 调用（要研究它的调用接口）

我觉的应该是接近krita 吧，将工作流作为选项? 然后使用参数接口传递信息

简单的单工作流使用 mixlab 的APP 前端应当就行了(mialab似乎不更新了）


多用户为了避免排队可能需要多实例调度

nodes.title: 自定义提示词（英文）
widgets_values: A professional studio photograph of an adorable French Bulldog puppy resting on a plush, round grey donut-shaped pet bed. The dog has a cream-colored coat, distinctive bat-like ears, and a playful expression with its tongue slightly sticking out. The lighting is soft and even, creating a clean, minimalist look against a white background. The pet bed appears luxuriously soft with long, fluffy grey fur texture. The composition is crisp and clear, with excellent detail and depth of field, shot in high resolution with professional photography equipment. The image has a modern, lifestyle pet photography aesthetic.

nodes.title:
为了降低云端 decode 延迟
这里可以使用本地vae解码

由于没有IC
这里必须使用highest，否则会随机化

groups.title: 将PS图缩放到1M像素，缩放参考到PS图大小（优化性能，为IC做准备）
载入主模型三件套，载入复用SAM 模型
是否启用 SAM 分割重绘区域（关闭使用手动 mask）
裁切方式：自动裁切图像到合适范围
裁切方式：手动标记 mask 裁切区域（用于多宠物情况）
是否启用反推提示词（关闭使用自定义提示词）
是否拼回原图上（适合小图，大图小心模糊）
是否优先方形裁切（需开启自动裁切）
